recipes.title: Chicken Fajitas
recipes.method: 1. Slice the chicken and vegetables. 2. Mix the cumin, paprika, and chili powder together and coat the chicken. 3. Cook the chicken in a pan until browned. 4. Add the vegetables to the pan and cook until softened. 5. Serve the chicken and vegetables in tortillas.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.method: 1. Cook the beef mince in a pan until browned. 2. Add the onion, garlic, carrot, and celery to the pan and cook until softened. 3. Add the chopped tomatoes, tomato puree, oregano, and basil to the pan and simmer for 20 minutes. 4. Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions. 5. Serve the spaghetti with the Bolognese sauce on top.

recipes.title: Vegetable Curry
recipes.method: 1. Cook the onion, garlic, and ginger in a pan until softened. 2. Add the turmeric, cumin, and coriander to the pan and cook for 1 minute. 3. Add the carrot, potato, and sweet potato to the pan and cook for 5 minutes. 4. Add the coconut milk to the pan and simmer for 20 minutes. 5. Serve the curry with rice.

recipes.title: Beef Stir Fry
recipes.method: 1. Cook the beef strips in a pan until browned. 2. Add the vegetables to the pan and cook until softened. 3. Mix the soy sauce, honey, and ginger together and add to the pan. 4. Cook for an additional 2 minutes. 5. Serve the stir fry with rice or noodles.

recipes.title: Chicken Parmesan
recipes.method: 1. Preheat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. 2. Coat the chicken breasts in flour, then dip in beaten eggs, and then coat in breadcrumbs. 3. Cook the chicken in a pan until browned on both sides. 4. Top each chicken breast with marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, and Parmesan cheese. 5. Bake in the oven for 20 minutes.

recipes.title: Vegetable Lasagna
recipes.method: 1. Cook the onion and garlic in a pan until softened. 2. Add the carrot, zucchini, and eggplant to the pan and cook for 5 minutes. 3. Add the chopped tomatoes, oregano, and basil to the pan and simmer for 20 minutes. 4. Layer the lasagna sheets, vegetable mixture, and ricotta cheese in a baking dish. 5. Top with mozzarella cheese and bake in the oven for 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Salmon with Lemon and Dill
recipes.method: 1. Preheat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. 2. Season the salmon fillets with salt, pepper, and dill. 3. Drizzle with olive oil and top with lemon slices. 4. Bake in the oven for 20 minutes.

recipes.title: Vegetable Fried Rice
recipes.method: 1. Cook the onion and carrot in a pan until softened. 2. Add the frozen peas to the pan and cook for 3 minutes. 3. Add the cooked rice to the pan and stir well. 4. Push the rice to one side of the pan and scramble the eggs in the other side. 5. Mix the eggs into the rice and add the soy sauce and sesame oil. 6. Cook for an additional 2 minutes.

recipes.title: Chicken Quesadillas
recipes.method: 1. Cook the chicken in a pan until browned. 2. Add the red pepper and onion to the pan and cook until softened. 3. Mix the cumin, paprika, and chili powder together and coat the chicken and vegetables. 4. Place a tortilla in a pan and top with the chicken and vegetable mixture and cheese. 5. Top with another tortilla and cook until the cheese is melted and the tortilla is crispy.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.method: 1. Cook the broccoli, carrot, red pepper, and onion in a pan until softened. 2. Mix the soy sauce, honey, and ginger together and add to the pan. 3. Cook for an additional 2 minutes. 4. Serve the stir fry with rice or noodles.
